basics.label: Organizer and Capacity Building Strategist
basics.summary: Experience as an organizer, advocate, and capacity building strategist with focus on disability rights and special education.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Advocate for people with disabilities with school, regional centers and agencies. Develop strategy and provide technical assistance for clients.
highlights: Conduct case reviews, research state and agency violations
Attend IPP, IEP, and mediations with clients as advocate
Maintain case files and necessary documents for attorney referrals

education.institution: St. Edward's University People's College of Law

publications.name: NCLR Latino Leadership Institute training
publications.summary: Understanding Your Child's Special Education Rights, Disability Civil Rights Throughout The Ages, Disability and Domestic Violence Survivors.
